name: Some Assembly Required
description:
Some Assembly Required is a fun and casual shoot-em-up with colorful visuals, diverse levels, and quirky characters. Unlock gunnies and parts to build a ship strong enough to take out your enemies. Travel the world map and unlock special challenge modes to free even more gunnies with hidden powers. 

This game is still in early development, created for the Indie Game Making Contest 2018. We plan on adding all kinds of new features, characters, and challenges in the future. A co-op mode is also being planned for final development. 

Story: 

Jay and her gunnie friends are having a lovely picnic lunch when out of nowhere, a ship appears piloted by the evil Dr. Weevil. He kidnaps almost all the gunnies, and it's up to Jay to and her basic gunnie to save them. 

Controls:

Gamepad or Keyboard/mouse

Features:
  • Shooter selection types
  • Challenge modes 
  • Original art
Credits:

Nichole Fredley

 Scott Fredley
